blocks.text: Registration and Login at Supabet: How to Do It Safely?

Supabet is a platform that combines casino and sports games to offer a higher variety of entertainment. As a random visitor, you can only test its casino games, except for live offers. Sports betting and real money offers require real money deposits and bets. For that, people need to register on the website. The process is simple and takes a couple of steps.
How to Register on Supabet?

Unregistered players can explore the variety of games that are available on the platforms. They can also test demo modes of most casino games to get acquainted with their rules, features, bonus rounds, themes, and maximum payouts. However, they cannot cash out their wins without registration that allows real money bets.
The registration process is simple and comprehensible. It will take you up to one minute. These are the steps you need to take:

items: Choose your welcome pack, enter a promo code, or refuse to accept bonuses.
Click “Choose” and get redirected to the next Registration page.
Enter your email that will serve for verification and possible “Forgot password” issues.
Create a reliable password and jot it somewhere so as not to forget it.
Get acquainted with the T&C and Privacy policy and put a tick.
Accept the rules and click ‘Next Step’ to get redirected to the second page of the registration form.
Provide your real name, surname, and date of birth.
Choose your country from the list and the currency.
Give your real contact number using +1.
Provide your address details, including your city, street, and postal code.

blocks.text: Later, you may need to send your documents to verify the given information. Due to that, the platform “knows” you are real and can contact your bank when you deposit real cash. The verification process will take a couple of hours.
How to Log In to Supabet

It does not matter if you are going to bet on casino games or sports when you log in. The website requires one login and password for both sections. The login process is much simpler than registration. You need to take 4 simple steps:

items: Enter the email and password you used for registration

blocks.text: After that, you will be able to top up your balance and play for real.
How to Make Your Password Hard to Break
Some people can know your email and try to hack your in-game account. That is why it is essential to create a reliable password to feel safer. There are three possible ways.
Use the Offered Password
When you register on the site, the system will use a random code generator. It will suggest the generated password that you can use to register and log in.
Generate the Password
The next option is to use password generators. They are random, so they are impossible to predict manually.
Create Your Own Password

Finally, you can create a password independently. This variant fits those who want to memorize it without the need to save it in the password manager. However, it must not be easy to guess. So, your date of birth will not be the best variant to use. Generally, there are several rules that you need to keep to when creating a reliable pass to register and log in to the platform.

items: The best length is from 6 to 8 symbols. The longer it is, the better.
It must contain both upper and lower case letters.
There should be at least one number.
If the platform allows special signs as exclamation marks or underscores, use them, too.
Keep the created password in a secure place.

blocks.text: When creating passwords, make sure you use a Latin keyboard (English) and do not add extra spaces.
Problematic Log In
Sometimes, players cannot enter their accounts. There are several possible reasons for that.

items: Internet instability. If you have a poor Internet connection, your login process can fail. Check the connection and re-enter it.
Wrong language. You can use French symbols instead of English or vice versa. Make sure the keyboard settings are correct.

Typos. This is the most common problem when users miss a symbol, use capital letters instead of lower case letters, add extra space, use a dash instead of an underscore, and more. So, always double-check your email and password when you want to log in.

blocks.text: If none of these variants work, your account can be hacked, or you have just forgotten your password.

What Extra Information Can the Website Demand

As has been said, you will not be able to deposit and gamble without giving details and supporting documents that let you pay for online services. It is a must to read the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy sections to know everything connected with data collection and storage.

According to the KYC and AML policies, the platform can request the document(s) to verify your identity and payment abilities. These can be your ID, proof of address, banking details, CPR number, social security number, documents proving your source of income, etc.

The site also uses cookies to collect information about its clients. It helps the developers improve the services, add the games that players want to play, improve the gaming environments, and more. Thanks to that, the platform becomes more user-centered.
